items.headline: Smashing Magazine
items.text: Smashing Magazine uses TinaCMS to edit content for 10's of thousands of posts and pages. Check out their [article](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2023/09/smashing-magazine-tinacms-manage-editorial-workflow/)  describing how they use branches and Git to manage content with Tina's [Editorial Workflow](https://tina.io/editorial-workflow).

items.headline: Unity
items.text: Unity, the game engine behind Pokémon Go and Call of Duty, is building a new documentation platform with TinaCMS and Next.js. They chose Tina because it provides a GUI for their Markdown content and because Tina's GraphQL API allows them to ingest docs content into other systems such as their AI chatbot.

items.headline: Locality Bank
items.text: [Locality](https://localitybank.com) is reinventing local business banking – pairing the best of personal relationships with comprehensive financing experience and innovative technology to help South Florida businesses flourish.

items.headline: comedia
items.text:
[comedia](
http://www.comediadesign.com) is a digital product agency with offices in San Francisco and Vancouver. We craft product and experiences for clients large and small. Our clients include Vodafone, Ericsson, NEC,  and Postmates.

items.headline: Roev
items.text: [Roev](https://www.roev.com/) is a company innovating at the intersection of electric vehicles and renewable energy. The site was designed and built by [CoMedia](https://www.comediadesign.com/).

items.headline: Shadow Lion
items.text: [Shadow Lion](https://shadowlion.com/) was founded in 2017 with the goal of supporting Tom Brady’s off-field media efforts but quickly began providing creative services to other athletes, influencers and organizations. The site was built by [VisualBoston](https://visualboston.com/) a digital studio based out of Boston, MA.

items.headline: Devolver Digital
items.text: A marketing site for a boutique game label that works with independent developers from all over the world to produce and promote some of the most original, eccentric, and beloved games of the past decade.

items.headline: Supernova
items.text: Supernova is 150+ exited founders backing top startups with advisory, operational, and investment support.  The site was developed by [Zeon studio](https://zeon.studio/).

items.headline: bunny.net
items.text: Hop on [bunny.net](https://bunny.net/) and speed up your web presence with the next-generation Content Delivery Service (CDN), Edge Storage, and Optimization Services at any scale.

items.headline: Useagility
items.text: [Useagility](https://useagility.com) is a Missouri-based agency operating since 2012.  They shape high-impact technology improvement projects for world-class businesses.

items.headline: Paradise Helicopters
items.text: A marketing site for Hawaii's largest locally owned and operated helicopter company. Built by [Murmur Creative](https://murmurcreative.com/) in Portland, Oregon.

items.headline: Nerdfish
items.text: The personal site of Daren Malfait, a freelance full-stack JavaScript/TypeScript & ReactJS engineer from Harelbeke, Belgium. [Check it out ](https://www.nerdfish.be/)

items.headline: We Are Many Hands
items.text: [ManyHands](https://wearemanyhands.com) is an event  for product people.  The event (and website) is by [Lighthouse](https://wearelighthouse.com), a specialist UX and UI design agency based in London.

items.headline: Microgen
items.text: [Microgen](https://microgen.site/) is an open-source site builder developed by [Protocol Labs](https://protocol.ai/) and [Bustout](https://bustout.com/). Find it on [GitHub here](https://github.com/pathfindertools/microgen).

items.headline: Community Coordinated Modeling Center
items.text: An information site for the CCMC, a group within NASA that enables, supports, and performs space science research.

items.headline: Labrys
items.text: A marketing site for Labrys, a global leader in blockchain product development. They design, develop and launch products using blockchain technology.

items.headline: Session
items.text: A marketing site for Session, a global online coaching company that connects professionals and companies with world-class business coaches.

items.headline: Catalyst Miami
items.text: A blog-style site showcasing the work of a non-profit organization built by the team at [Code Nation](https://www.codenation.com/). Catalyst Miami's mission is to identify and collectively solve issues adversely affecting low-wealth communities throughout Miami-Dade County.

items.headline: APFX
items.text: A marketing site for APFX, an international foreign exchange firm providing bespoke services for corporate businesses globally.
